summary: It change his morphing that you want.
descriptionHtml:
・Feature
This armor can change his morphing your choosed.
It is sold by Farengar in Dragonsreach.

・Requirement
SKSE 1.6.16 http://skse.silverlock.org/
Skyrim 1.9.32

And supporting Dawnguard and Dragonborn(Not Requirement)

・How to use
Cast "Meta Morphosis Model Set" and choose outfit.

-Custom
Cast "Meta Morphosis Save Custom" and choose slot.
Later,Cast "Meta Morphosis Model Set" and choose slot your saved.
It support outfit added by Mod.

-Option
References change 1st/3rd person vanilla outfit.
it reference Data/Meshes/Metamorphosis/

example Steel Armor
male 3rdperson Data/Meshes/Armor/Steel/CuirassLight_1.nif
1stperson Data/Meshes/Armor/Steel/1stPersonCuirassLight_1.nif
female 3rdperson Data/Meshes/Armor/Steel/FCuirassLight_1.nif
1stperson Data/Meshes/Armor/Steel/F1stPersonCuirassLight_1.nif
after choose 3rdperson,yes
male 3rdperspn Data/Meshes/MetaMorphosis/Armor/Steel/CuirassLight_1.nif
1stperson Data/Meshes/Armor/Steel/1stPersonCuirassLight_1.nif
female 3rdperson Data/Meshes/Metamorphosis/Armor/Steel/FCuirassLight_1.nif
1stperson Data/Meshes/Armor/Steel/F1stPersonCuirassLight_1.nif

in case Dawnguard
vanilla vampire robes
male 3rdperson Data/Meshes/DLC01/Clothes/Vampire/VampireRobes_1.nif
after 3rdperson,yes
male 3rdperson Data/Meshes/Metamorphosis/DLC01/Clothes/Vampire/VampireRobes_1.nif

I recommend to use replacer.

・Credit
Skyrim -Bethesda
SKSE - SKSE team
author: pepereke
